description: Adobe RoboHelp is a program technical writers often use to publish help, policy, and knowledge-based content. Phrase lists are one of many features RoboHelp provides that allow authors to customize their help documentation.

For example, the author may write documentation about uploading files to a company's secure server. When creating the phrase list, they will add phrases they believe a user will search for and connect it to the appropriate page (e.g., the "how to upload" phrase may connect to the "How to Upload" section).
NOTE: When the user saves the list of custom phrases as a PHR file, RoboHelp saves the PHR file as part of a help project ( .XPJ file).
